questions.question: We went …………………………… on the weekend.
questions.description: There is no preposition in the expression go swimming, go walking, go climbing etc.

questions.question: Let’s go ………………………… if you aren't busy.
questions.description: This is a common expression referring to leisure activities.

questions.question: I went swimming ………………………… the river.
questions.description: Prepositions of place are used after go + …ing.

questions.question: Why did you go skating ...................... that lake? You could have killed yourself.
You .................... give me my money back.
One of my cousins ……………………… abroad.
questions.description: Use a singular verb after one of.

questions.question: I was scarcely inside the house ………………………. the kids started screaming.
questions.description: Scarcely is followed by when or before.

questions.question: No sooner had I put the phone down, ................... it started ringing again.
questions.description: We use than after no sooner.

questions.question: She had hardly stepped out ..................... it started pouring.
Why sit down when you can ....................... down?
questions.description: To lie down is to recline.

questions.question: She accused me of ...................... to her.
questions.description: To lie is to make a false statement.
